-1.title: Kuldeepak
-1.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

imdb.plot outline: This is a great new show about a baby who has been posessed by a demon and born into a large family who are oblivious to this truth. We watch as the story unfolds with superb suspense and twists which will keep you glued to the screen. As well as some great characters and performances, this show has real potential to be a big hit!

plot: This is a great new show about a baby who has been posessed by a demon and born into a large family who are oblivious to this truth.
